EmailTemplate.description: First email to dealers still on GSI with instructions on switching A record to EdgeCast IP Address
EmailTemplate.name: DNS Migration Email #1
EmailTemplate.subject: SYSTEM ALERT: Required Action for VinSolutions Websites
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Valued Website Client,
You are receiving this message because the DNS settings on your VinSolutions website(s) needs modified in order for you to take advantage of our faster data center.
You can complete the migration process using the easy step-by-step instruction found here: http://vinsolutions.com/dns.aspx
Please make the change by Sept 15th.
For any questions regarding this process, please contact your assigned Website Account Manager {!Account.WAM2__c}.
We appreciate your support in our efforts to continually improve the dealer experience!
Sincerely,
Your Team at VinSolutions
Your Website Account Manager for questions or concerns: {!Account.WAM2__c}
